glsa.title: GnuTLS: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A null pointer dereference in GnuTLS might allow attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: GnuTLS is a secure communications library implementing the SSL, TLS and DTLS protocols and technologies around them.

description.p: A null pointer dereference while decoding a status response TLS extension with valid contents was discovered in GnuTLS.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GnuTLS users should upgrade to the latest version:
Packages which depend on this library may need to be recompiled. Tools such as revdep-rebuild may assist in identifying some of these packages.
